item.title: 16: No One's Trying to Make a Shitty Website
item.descrition:
How to work and collaborate with developers and how to make sure your designs and expectations are followed-through.

Sketch 3.7

  • Download the beta
  • Style are awesome now (overrides)
  • Shared Styles now no longer sync automatically

How you work and interact with engineers?

Question asked by Jony Heim on Twitter

What’s the problem?

  • Products don’t end up like the mockups
  • Things are lost in the process
  • No one’s happy

Kickoff

  • Bring developers early

While designing

  • Ask questions
  • Ask for feedback
    • Show your work early
    • Fresh Eyes session
  • Consider edge cases
    • Error states
    • Internationalization
    • Empty states
    • Transitions
    • No internet connection
  • Tip: Bootstrap Grids for example
  • 8pt grid

Handoff

  • Prototypes
  • Mockups
  • Annotations
  • Zeplin

While developing

  • Get them to care about good design
  • Design reviews
    • Any code in the codebase that affects user experience needs to be reviewed by a designer
    • Stuff doesn’t go out unless we okay it

Aftershow

  • Apple Music Ad
  • Tesla Model 3

item.title: 15: Hiring a person, not a portfolio
item.descrition:
Job interviews, how to get and prepare for them

Follow up

  • InVision bought Silver

  • Layout Episode 13

Show topic: Job interviews

How to get an interview?

  • Have a portfolio

  • Be out there! Twitter, Dribbble, Medium, etc.

  • Be involved in community events, meetups

  • Squares Conference

    • Use discount code SQUARES25 for 25% off

  • Ask people to grab a coffee

  • Advice for people fresh out of college

Types of interviews

General life story

  • Show you’re passionate (reference articles, etc)

  • Tell a good story

Portfolio review

  • Only show your best stuff

  • Be honest (being critical of your work is good)

  • Be open to feedback

Design exercise (whiteboard)

  • How is it like to work with you?

  • What‚Äôs your thinking process like?

  • Design Criticism (at Facebook)

Sebastian on Twitter asks: ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs your worst interview experience and what kind of question should the interviewee ask in an interview‚Äù
